title: WTB: T206 Lajoie with bat, Tolstoi
author: Rob D.

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Lajoie with bat, Tolstoi
posts.post_content:
I dropped the ball when one of these was in a major auction recently (forgot the closing date), and the one currently on eBay is listed with a Buy It Now of about twice its true value. I'll pay aggressively, so please let me know if you have one for sale. Also have a large number of T and E Hall of Famer and type cards to trade.

Thanks,

Rob
